channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: TaxHacker
item.description:
TaxHacker

Self-hosted AI accounting app. LLM analyzer for receipts, invoices, transactions with custom prompts and categories
Hmmm, looks like Manager now has a contender. I just wish it has api endpoints and robust documentation. But I can query the Postgres database anyway, right?
item.content:encoded:
TaxHacker

Self-hosted AI accounting app. LLM analyzer for receipts, invoices, transactions with custom prompts and categories
Hmmm, looks like Manager now has a contender. I just wish it has api endpoints and robust documentation. But I can query the Postgres database anyway, right?

item.title: Portracker
item.description:
Portracker

By auto-discovering services on your systems, portracker provides a live, accurate map of your network. It helps eliminate manual tracking in spreadsheets and prevents deployment failures caused by port conflicts.
item.content:encoded:
Portracker

By auto-discovering services on your systems, portracker provides a live, accurate map of your network. It helps eliminate manual tracking in spreadsheets and prevents deployment failures caused by port conflicts.

item.title: DocMD
item.description:
DocMD

Generate beautiful, lightweight static documentation sites from Markdown files.
item.content:encoded:
DocMD

Generate beautiful, lightweight static documentation sites from Markdown files.

item.title: Docker Wakeup
item.description:
Docker Wakeup

An intelligent Docker container management system that automatically starts containers on-demand when accessed, stops idle containers to save resources, and generates NGINX configurations for seamless reverse proxy setup.
item.content:encoded:
Docker Wakeup

An intelligent Docker container management system that automatically starts containers on-demand when accessed, stops idle containers to save resources, and generates NGINX configurations for seamless reverse proxy setup.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K1B6XVPMFA4RTFWSTMYSM18T
item.description: Just looking around the n8n subreddit it gives me the impression that n8n = AI. No! #n8n is a lot more that that!
item.content:encoded: Just looking around the n8n subreddit it gives me the impression that n8n = AI. No! #n8n is a lot more that that!

item.title: Snippets Library
item.description:
Snippets Library

A secure, lightning-fast code snippet manager to store, organize, and share your code with beautiful syntax highlighting.
May be a good alternative to ByteStash. The problem is there’s no easy docker install method.
item.content:encoded:
Snippets Library

A secure, lightning-fast code snippet manager to store, organize, and share your code with beautiful syntax highlighting.
May be a good alternative to ByteStash. The problem is there’s no easy docker install method.

item.title: PicPeak
item.description:
PicPeak

Self-hosted photo sharing platform for photographers & events. Open-source alternative to PicDrop/Scrapbook with time-limited galleries, password protection, custom branding & no monthly fees. Built with React + Node.js
I wonder if this is a good alternative to WeddingShare?
item.content:encoded:
PicPeak

Self-hosted photo sharing platform for photographers & events. Open-source alternative to PicDrop/Scrapbook with time-limited galleries, password protection, custom branding & no monthly fees. Built with React + Node.js
I wonder if this is a good alternative to WeddingShare?

item.title: Expense Owl
item.description:
Expense Owl

Extremely simple, self-hosted expense tracker with a beautiful UI.

My wish for a personal finance app:

  • Auto-categorization of transactions
  • Great UI, especially for mobile
  • Rest API
item.content:encoded:
Expense Owl

Extremely simple, self-hosted expense tracker with a beautiful UI.

My wish for a personal finance app:

  • Auto-categorization of transactions
  • Great UI, especially for mobile
  • Rest API

item.title: PersonalAccounter
item.description:
PersonalAccounter

A Easy To use & Deploy comprehensive PHP-based personal and small corporate accounting management system with powerful expense tracking, subscription management, and reporting capabilities.
item.content:encoded:
PersonalAccounter

A Easy To use & Deploy comprehensive PHP-based personal and small corporate accounting management system with powerful expense tracking, subscription management, and reporting capabilities.

item.title: EZ Book Keeping
item.description:
EZ Book Keeping

A lightweight, self-hosted personal finance app with a sleek, user-friendly interface and powerful bookkeeping features.
Browsed through the interface, and it’s good actually. Might prove to be a good alternative to Actual Budget. And it has a built-in rest API to get our data.
item.content:encoded:
EZ Book Keeping

A lightweight, self-hosted personal finance app with a sleek, user-friendly interface and powerful bookkeeping features.
Browsed through the interface, and it’s good actually. Might prove to be a good alternative to Actual Budget. And it has a built-in rest API to get our data.
